Maze

Class GraphicsMaze

  • java.lang.Object
    • Maze.GraphicsMaze

  • public class GraphicsMaze
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates a graphical representation of the GenMaze object.
    See Also:
    GenMaze

    • Constructor Detail

      • GraphicsMaze

        public GraphicsMaze(GenMaze m)
        Initializes the specific images required for cell tiles and walls as well as initializing an thread safe array list of RectCell objects.
        Parameters:
        m - GenMaze object containing completed (conceptual) maze.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Draws a maze using rectangle objects where the maze is drawn based on the GenMaze object representation. Depending on the visibility, the cell, it's cell type and the walls that it contains are drawn to the screen. Rectangle objects are created for all of the components in a cell (cell box (tile), walls and type) and a RectCell object is initialized based on these arguments. Each RectCell object is added to the list, once all rectangles in the maze have been drawn and added, a clone is made for safety when doing collision detection/avoidance.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics rendering object used to draw to the window (JFrame/JPanel).

      • getRectangles

        public java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<RectCell> getRectangles()
        Returns a clone (for safety) of the RectCell array list which is required by the character object's collision detection.
        Returns:
        copy Cloned version of walls ArrayList
        See Also:
        copy
